attributes.title: killed everyone i love
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to try and learn more about the president. i assumed that it would all be fine and dandy. the first warning sight is it took 7 hours to download and used 3 full charges. then i opened the app and i could hear was polish witch chants. i didn't think much of it but then when i showed my mom this her eyes rolled to the back of her head and then she started chanted along with the app. i didn't know what to do so i called an ambulance. one they arrived the looked at her and screamed in terror and ran off. so then i asked my dad for help. i showed him the app and he just immediately started to seize. after about a minute he got up and his eyes rolled to the back of his head like they did with my mom. at this point i knew the app was out to kill much like its creator so i tried to delete it from my phone. however when ever i tried to delete it it started to scream things like your a fat chungus. Once this happened u deceded i just had to throw my phone out so i did. i smashes it and threw in a lake. i thought u was safe but later that night when i was watching my third hour of one direction videos my phone that he previously been smashed and thrown in a lake came flying towards me. it hit me square in the face. my sister picked it up and when she looked at it she faced the same fate as my parents. i was starting to i wonder why i wasn't being turned into a polish witch and then being killed by rats. i didn't have time to figure it out so i decided to lock the phone a safe. and long story short that didn't work. my brother came over thinking he could help and let's just say that he couldn't. i called my bubby and relieve that she had download the app and it turned her into a polish witch. this app has ruined my life and the lives of everyone i love. NEVER DOWNLOAD IT AND GIVE IT A BAD REVIEW!!!!! xoxoxoxo xoxoxoxo xoxoxoxo xoxoxoxo 
דונלד טראמפ הוא סופרמיציסט לבן.  עצירה מוחלטת.  אם אתה מצביע בשבילו הוא סופרמן לבן.  עצירה מוחלטת.
